Package game.items.magicalitems

Class MagicalItem

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
game.items.magicalitems.MagicalItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.capabilities.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Printable
Direct Known Subclasses:
FireFlower, PowerStar, SuperMushroom
public abstract class MagicalItem
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
This class is an abstract class extended from the Item class to provide blueprint for magical items such as Super Mushroom and Power Star classes.

    • MagicalItem

      public MagicalItem​(java.lang.String name, char displayChar, boolean portable, boolean droppable)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of this Item
      displayChar - the character to use to represent this item if it is on the ground
      portable - true if and only if the Item can be picked up
      droppable - true if and only if the Item can be dropped
